txt.en: You are now somewhat drunk! Hey...when did all those rotten vegetables get in your inventory?

A drunkard at the fair was scolded by a Bounder, and has been reduced to drinking by himself in hiding. He wants revenge on the Bounders who so cruelly discouraged his behaviour.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Those Bounders are so mean! Accusing me, poor innocent me, of drunkorderly and disconduct...it cannot be borne!\n\n'You...you'll have a drunk with me, won't you, [placeholder]? Stick it to those nasty Bounders, eh, [placeholder]?'
There seems to be a beer right in the hand of the drunkard.\n\nThe drunkard encourages you to help yourself to some beer to commiserate with the woes of the drunkards of the Faire.
'Ha ha! Well done, [placeholder]...you bowed them shounders!\n\n'Hey, now...who drank my beer?'

Bounders can be found throughout the Farmers Faire in Bywater.\n\nYou should avoid the Bounders while drunk...and also take a little revenge upon them for being so hard on the folks who love to drink during festivals.
Now that you have assailed the Bounders with a little sweet revenge, you should return to the drunkard.\n\nThe drunkard is near the Green Dragon Inn in Bywater during the Farmers Faire.
Drink a beer to commiserate with the poor harangued drunkard
Throw rotten vegetables at the fun-spoiling Bounders ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Don't let the Bounders spot you!
Return to the drunkard with news of your success against the Bounders
